```{r}
# https://imai.fas.harvard.edu/research/files/mediationR.pdf
# 8.3.1 Estimation of Causal Mediation Effects
library("mediation")
data("jobs")

# The Baronâ€“Kenny Procedure with the Interaction Term
set.seed(1234)
model.m <- lm(job_seek ~ age + sex,
              data = jobs)
model.y <- lm(depress2 ~ age + sex + age*sex,
              data = jobs)
out <- mediate(model.m,
                 model.y,
                 sims = 1000,
                 boot = TRUE,
                 #INT = TRUE, 
                 treat = "sex", 
                 mediator = "age");
summary(out)
```
